title: Himi 630
lyrics:
11.11.11.11. & tau
1.
ʻĀ hake kāinga mo fakafeta’i!
Tau fakamālō he mana ne fai
‘I Pētelihema he kuonga mu’a:
‘A e hoko tangata ‘a hotau ‘Otua!
Fakafeta’i! Fakafeta’i!
Ko e pehē te tau noa!
Fakamālō he ‘ofa ‘a hotau ‘Otua.
Ne tuku ‘a Langi mo hono masani
Kae ha’u ‘o huhu’i ‘a e hia ‘a māmani.
2.
Ne hoko ‘a e taimi, mo tā hono houa,
Ke fotu ki Maama ‘a e ‘Eiki tupu’a;
Hā’ele mai la mo e kau ‘āngelo,
Pea fonu ‘a Langi he fakamālō.
Fakafeta’i! etc.
3.
Lau ‘e kitautolu ‘o hangē ko e Siu
‘E hoa ‘ene nofo mo e Hau Aoniu.
Kae tuku ‘e la hono anga ta’ehā,
‘O ‘afio mai he tatau ‘o e tangata.
Fakafeta’i, etc.
4.
Vakai ki he potu Ne tokoto ai,
‘Oiau, hono tuku he ‘ai’angakai!
Ko e ‘Eiki ne fotu he ha’oha’onga
Na’e ‘ikai ke hao he fale fononga
Fakafeta’i, etc.
5.
Ne’ine’i he mavava ‘a e kau ‘āngelo!
Ne’ine’i tukulolo ki ai ‘a e kau poto!
Ko e me’a na’e puli tā ne nau lave’i:
Ko si’i Valevale ko hota Koeli.
Fakafeta’i, etc.
6.
Monū kinautolu he’enau mātā
‘A e hū ki māmani ‘a ‘Imānuela.
Kae lahi kitaua he’eta ‘ilo’i
‘A e ngāue ne hoko ki hono ‘alo’i.
Fakafeta’i, etc.
7.
Taau mo kitaua ke fakafeta’i
He ‘Aho ‘Alo’i ‘oku ta ‘i ai!
Ko e me’a tepu ē, ke ta tukupā
Ke mateaki’i ‘a e Hau tāpuhā.
Fakafeta’i! Fakafeta’i! *
C.P.W.B.
